items.title: Razer resurrects the first ever gaming mouse as a limited edition

items.title: How to score Pokémon Legends: Z-A on Switch down at $45 Prime shipped
items.summary:
While perhaps not the most ideal option, deals on the new Pokémon Legends: Z-A have been somewhere between very hard to come by and completely non-existent. Over at Woot, however, you will find the Switch version marked down from the regular $60 to $44.99 with free shipping for Prime members (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This is indeed the Latin America Version of the game with a Spanish cover, but “all Nintendo Switch Video Games are Region Free and will function normally in any Switch console. Units ship with Spanish as the main language and English as the secondary language on the packaging.” Again, it might not be exactly what you were after, but it also might kind of an interesting collectible for U.S. gamers too, and it is one of the lowest prices we have tracked on the game to date. 

more…

items.title: A pay-to-scrape AI licensing standard is now official
items.summary: An open licensing standard that aims to make AI companies pay for the content they vacuum up across the web is now an official specification. Really Simple Licensing 1.0 - or RSL for short - gives publishers the ability to dictate licensing and compensation rules to the web crawlers that visit their sites. The RSL […]

items.title: Update: Nintendo Virtual Boy hardware now up for purchase
items.summary:
Update: The new Virtual Boy hardware is now available for purchase directly from Nintendo for Switch Online members. “This product can be purchased by those who have a paid Nintendo Switch Online membership. To play games in the Virtual Boy – Nintendo Classics, you will need an active Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership. The Nintendo Switch Lite is not compatible.”

During today’s lengthy Nintendo Direct, we did not get any updates on the Switch Online GameCube library, but Nintendo did officially announce Virtual Boy! It is ready to add an entirely new console to its Nintendo Classics collection in the form of the ultra-retro Virtual Boy library alongside an actual Virtual Boy peripheral you stick your Switch or Switch 2 inside of. Details below.

items.title: Save 48% today on Glorious’ regularly $220 GMMK 3 Hall effect mechanical keyboard while it’s down to $113 all-time low
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Glorious’ GMMK 3 HE Rapid trigger keyboard in black down to $112.85 shipped. This is originally a $180 keyboard that has fetched as much as $220 in recent months at Amazon. Today’s deal delivers a straight-up $107 discount on its usual going rate, landing it $2 below the previous all-time low it briefly hit ahead of the Black Friday sale. We saw the standard, non-HE 65% variant of this keyboard go for less earlier this year, but this is the lowest price we have tracked for this particular model that lets you switch between both MX mechanical and magnetic switches. Head below for more details.

items.title: Indigenous Guard across the Amazon unite forces to protect their territories
items.summary: SINANGOE, Ecuador, Dec 10 (Reuters) - About 200 members of Indigenous groups from Ecuador, Colombia and Peru gathered early this month in Ecuador's Amazonian community of Sinangoe, wedged along the border with neighboring Colombia, to collectively strategize how to defend their ancestral lands. To mark the occasion, they drank sap from the ancestral yoco plant, and cleansed their energies with tobacco and nettle leaves.  Read full story

items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Microsoft’s Surface Pro 2-in-1 Copilot+ PC in Sapphire finish with a Snapdragon X Elite chip down to $999.99 shipped. This is originally a $1,700 model that still ranges between $1,200 and $1,700 at Amazon. Today’s deal takes $700 off its usual going rate, landing it $175 below its previous all-time low. We saw this variant bundled with a keyboard and Microsoft 365 for $1,299 earlier this year, but the standalone device hasn’t had a notable discount in some time. It’s fetching its lowest price right now, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

items.title: Tenways’ Holiday Season Sale gives the new Wayfarer cruiser e-bike its largest $366 FREE bundle at its $1,899 low, more
items.summary:
Tenways has launched its Holiday Season Sale with up to $500 e-bike discounts, alongside the usual extra $100 savings for select careers/students, as well as a bonus $300 savings when buying two e-bikes together. Among the lineup, we’re seeing Tenways’ all-new Wayfarer Cruiser e-bike at $1,899 shipped, and also getting the largest bundle to date of $366 in FREE gear. This model just hit the market at the tail-end of October with a $300 launch discount from its $2,199 full price and getting a $277 bundle – which then extended into the brand’s Black Friday Sale event. Now, you’re getting the same $300 markdown here but with a larger $366 bundle (made up of a rear carrier, mud flaps, a kickstand, and a large pannier bag) for a return low price and the best deal we’ve seen yet. Head below to browse the full lineup of deals during this Holiday Season Sale.

more…

items.title: Anker SOLIX teases early Christmas deals with a 72-hour flash sale taking up to $3,734 off power stations from $371
items.summary:
Anker SOLIX has launched a collection of 72-hour flash sales as early Christmas deals, which will be lasting through December 11 for folks who want to score theirs ahead of the upcoming holiday sale. Among the lineup, the brand’s new C1000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station is down at $371.45 shipped, and matching the price over at Amazon. Only on the market since September, it’s coming down from its $799 MSRP with $428 cut from the tag, which we’ve seen on average keeping down around $449, and is only beaten out by the $349 low we spotted during its full Black Friday event two weeks ago. This is still a great value at the second-best price we have tracked, which you can learn more about below or by reading our hands-on tested review here. You’ll also find the other flash offers below.

more…

items.title: Heybike’s Christmas Sale saves you up to $800 on e-bikes alongside up to $266 FREE gear/gifts starting from $999
items.summary:
Heybike has officially switched lanes and launched its Christmas Sale with up to $800 e-bike discounts alongside FREE bundled gear and gifts. One notable return is the ALPHA All-Terrain Mid-Drive e-bike with $266 in FREE gear + a gift pack at $1,299 shipped. Coming down far and fast from its $1,699 MSRP right out the gate, we only saw temporary flash offerings to this price during the brand’s early Black Friday Sale, until the full event kicked off on the actual day of the shopping holiday, but it’s coming back immediately for this sale. You’re saving $400 off the tag with this deal for the all-time lowest price we have tracked, while also scoring $266 in FREE gear (a steel cable lock, helmet, waterproof backpack, and large cargo basket) and a mystery gift pack like we saw during last month’s sales events. Head below to learn more about this e-bike and the full lineup of deals while this Christmas Sale lasts.

While we are waiting on some Kindle and Fire tablet offers, Amazon is now offering up to 60% off select devices ahead of the holidays including the best price ever on the new Echo Dot Max, better-than-Black Friday pricing on Echo Spot, return lows on its latest smart displays, and a whole bunch more. Scope it all out down below.
